name: Doors & Loot
description:
Venture into this little roguelike where you will have to face bloodthirsty skeletons. Get to the bottom of the tower and discover the mysteries that await inside.

The higher you go, the better the reward, but don't risk too much or you'll come back empty handed.

Can't find equipment that convinces you? Let the blacksmith custom make it for you.

Have you run out of potions? The merchant sure has some to spare.

Don't know how to use that cool weapon? I'm sure the sorceress can help you.

Will you make it to the end?
